Entry.Name: Status__Underrange
Entry.Comment: Underrange event active

Entry.Name: Status__Overrange
Entry.Comment: Overrange event active

Entry.Name: Status__Limit 1
Entry.Comment: Bit0: Value smaller/equal Limit1 Bit1: Value bigger/equal Limit1

Entry.Name: Status__Limit 2
Entry.Comment: Bit0: Value smaller/equal Limit2 Bit1: Value bigger/equal Limit2

Entry.Name: Status__Error
Entry.Comment: Bit set when Over- or Underrange

Entry.Name: Status__TxPDO State
Entry.Comment: TRUE when this TxPDO is not valid

Entry.Name: Status__TxPDO Toggle
Entry.Comment: Bit toggles everytime when new value available

Variable.Name: Term 4 (EL3403).PM Status data.Missing zero crossing A
Term 4 (EL3403).PM Status data.Missing zero crossing B
Term 4 (EL3403).PM Status data.Missing zero crossing C
Inputs.Frm0State
Variable.Comment: 0x0001 = 1. EtherCAT command not sent (NOP requested) 0x0002 = 2. EtherCAT command not sent (NOP requested) 0x0004 = 3. EtherCAT command not sent (NOP requested) ... 0x4000 = 15. EtherCAT command not sent (NOP requested) 0x8000 = complete frame not sent

Variable.Name: Inputs.Frm0WcState
Variable.Comment: 0x0001 = wrong working counter of 1. EtherCAT command received 0x0002 = wrong working counter of 2. EtherCAT command received 0x0004 = wrong working counter of 3. EtherCAT command received ... 0x4000 = wrong working counter of 15. EtherCAT command received 0x8000 = complete frame missing

Variable.Name: Term 4 (EL3403).WcState.WcState
Variable.Comment: 0 = Data valid 1 = Data invalid

Variable.Name: Box 1 (baer_motor_testbed).WcState.WcState
Variable.Comment: 0 = Data valid 1 = Data invalid

Variable.Name: Term 3 (EL3064).WcState.WcState
Variable.Comment: 0 = Data valid 1 = Data invalid

Variable.Name: Drive 5 (Elmo Drive ).WcState.WcState
Variable.Comment: 0 = Data valid 1 = Data invalid

Variable.Name: Inputs.Frm0InputToggle
Variable.Comment: 0x0001 = Toggle Bit: 1. EtherCAT command received new inputs 0x0002 = Toggle Bit: 2. EtherCAT command received new inputs 0x0004 = Toggle Bit: 3. EtherCAT command received new inputs ... 0x4000 = Toggle Bit: 15. EtherCAT command received new inputs 0x8000 = Old frame - not from the actual cycle - received

Variable.Name: SyncUnits.<default>.<unreferenced>.WcState.WcState
Variable.Comment: 0 = Data valid 1 = Data invalid

Variable.Name: SyncUnits.<default>.Task 2.WcState.WcState
Variable.Comment: 0 = Data valid 1 = Data invalid

Variable.Name: SyncUnits.Drive.<unreferenced>.WcState.WcState
Variable.Comment: 0 = Data valid 1 = Data invalid

Variable.Name: Inputs.SlaveCount
Variable.Comment: Actual count of EtherCAT slaves received

Variable.Name: Inputs.DevState
Variable.Comment: 0x0001 = Link error 0x0002 = I/O locked after link error (I/O reset required) 0x0004 = Link error (redundancy adapter) 0x0008 = Missing one frame (redundancy mode) 0x0010 = Out of send resources (I/O reset required) 0x0020 = Watchdog triggered 0x0040 = Ethernet driver (miniport) not found 0x0080 = I/O reset active 0x0100 = At least one device in 'INIT' state 0x0200 = At least one device in 'PRE-OP' state 0x0400 = At least one device in 'SAFE-OP' state 0x0800 = At least one device indicates an error state 0x1000 = DC not in sync

Variable.Name: InfoData.ChangeCount
Variable.Comment: Info data change counter

Variable.Name: InfoData.DevId
Variable.Comment: DeviceId of EtherCAT device

Variable.Name: InfoData.AmsNetId
Variable.Comment: AmsNetId of EtherCAT device

Variable.Name: InfoData.CfgSlaveCount
Variable.Comment: Count of configured EtherCAT slaves

Variable.Name: Box 1 (baer_motor_testbed).InfoData.State
Variable.Comment: 0x___1 = Slave in 'INIT' state 0x___2 = Slave in 'PREOP' state 0x___3 = Slave in 'BOOT' state 0x___4 = Slave in 'SAFEOP' state 0x___8 = Slave in 'OP' state 0x001_ = Slave signals error 0x002_ = Invalid vendorId, productCode... read 0x004_ = Initialization error occurred 0x008_ = Slave disabled 0x010_ = Slave not present 0x020_ = Slave signals link error 0x040_ = Slave signals missing link 0x080_ = Slave signals unexpected link 0x100_ = Communication port A 0x200_ = Communication port B 0x400_ = Communication port C 0x800_ = Communication port D

Variable.Name: Term 2 (EK1100).InfoData.State
Variable.Comment: 0x___1 = Slave in 'INIT' state 0x___2 = Slave in 'PREOP' state 0x___3 = Slave in 'BOOT' state 0x___4 = Slave in 'SAFEOP' state 0x___8 = Slave in 'OP' state 0x001_ = Slave signals error 0x002_ = Invalid vendorId, productCode... read 0x004_ = Initialization error occurred 0x008_ = Slave disabled 0x010_ = Slave not present 0x020_ = Slave signals link error 0x040_ = Slave signals missing link 0x080_ = Slave signals unexpected link 0x100_ = Communication port A 0x200_ = Communication port B 0x400_ = Communication port C 0x800_ = Communication port D

Variable.Name: Term 3 (EL3064).InfoData.State
Variable.Comment: 0x___1 = Slave in 'INIT' state 0x___2 = Slave in 'PREOP' state 0x___3 = Slave in 'BOOT' state 0x___4 = Slave in 'SAFEOP' state 0x___8 = Slave in 'OP' state 0x001_ = Slave signals error 0x002_ = Invalid vendorId, productCode... read 0x004_ = Initialization error occurred 0x008_ = Slave disabled 0x010_ = Slave not present 0x020_ = Slave signals link error 0x040_ = Slave signals missing link 0x080_ = Slave signals unexpected link 0x100_ = Communication port A 0x200_ = Communication port B 0x400_ = Communication port C 0x800_ = Communication port D

Variable.Name: Term 3 (EL3064).InfoData.AdsAddr
Variable.Comment: Complete ADS address to access the slave (mailbox)

Variable.Name: Term 4 (EL3403).InfoData.State
Variable.Comment: 0x___1 = Slave in 'INIT' state 0x___2 = Slave in 'PREOP' state 0x___3 = Slave in 'BOOT' state 0x___4 = Slave in 'SAFEOP' state 0x___8 = Slave in 'OP' state 0x001_ = Slave signals error 0x002_ = Invalid vendorId, productCode... read 0x004_ = Initialization error occurred 0x008_ = Slave disabled 0x010_ = Slave not present 0x020_ = Slave signals link error 0x040_ = Slave signals missing link 0x080_ = Slave signals unexpected link 0x100_ = Communication port A 0x200_ = Communication port B 0x400_ = Communication port C 0x800_ = Communication port D

Variable.Name: Term 4 (EL3403).InfoData.AdsAddr
Variable.Comment: Complete ADS address to access the slave (mailbox)

Variable.Name: Drive 5 (Elmo Drive ).InfoData.State
Variable.Comment: 0x___1 = Slave in 'INIT' state 0x___2 = Slave in 'PREOP' state 0x___3 = Slave in 'BOOT' state 0x___4 = Slave in 'SAFEOP' state 0x___8 = Slave in 'OP' state 0x001_ = Slave signals error 0x002_ = Invalid vendorId, productCode... read 0x004_ = Initialization error occurred 0x008_ = Slave disabled 0x010_ = Slave not present 0x020_ = Slave signals link error 0x040_ = Slave signals missing link 0x080_ = Slave signals unexpected link 0x100_ = Communication port A 0x200_ = Communication port B 0x400_ = Communication port C 0x800_ = Communication port D

Variable.Name: Drive 5 (Elmo Drive ).InfoData.AdsAddr
Variable.Comment: Complete ADS address to access the slave (mailbox)

Variable.Name: Drive 5 (Elmo Drive ).InfoData.Chn0
Variable.Comment: Slave has a channel

Variable.Name: SyncUnits.<default>.<unreferenced>.InfoData.State
Variable.Comment: 0x___1 = At least one slave in 'INIT' state 0x___2 = At least one slave in 'PREOP' state 0x___3 = At least one slave in 'BOOT' state 0x___4 = At least one slave in 'SAFEOP' state 0x___8 = At least one slave in 'OP' state 0x001_ = At least one slave signals error 0x002_ = Invalid vendorId, productCode... read 0x004_ = Initialization error occurred 0x008_ = At least one slave disabled 0x010_ = At least one slave not present 0x020_ = At least one slave signals link error 0x040_ = At least one slave signals missing link 0x080_ = At least one slave signals unexpected link

Variable.Name: SyncUnits.<default>.<unreferenced>.InfoData.SlaveCount
Variable.Comment: Info data slave counter

Variable.Name: SyncUnits.<default>.Task 2.InfoData.State
Variable.Comment: 0x___1 = At least one slave in 'INIT' state 0x___2 = At least one slave in 'PREOP' state 0x___3 = At least one slave in 'BOOT' state 0x___4 = At least one slave in 'SAFEOP' state 0x___8 = At least one slave in 'OP' state 0x001_ = At least one slave signals error 0x002_ = Invalid vendorId, productCode... read 0x004_ = Initialization error occurred 0x008_ = At least one slave disabled 0x010_ = At least one slave not present 0x020_ = At least one slave signals link error 0x040_ = At least one slave signals missing link 0x080_ = At least one slave signals unexpected link

Variable.Name: SyncUnits.<default>.Task 2.InfoData.SlaveCount
Variable.Comment: Info data slave counter

Variable.Name: SyncUnits.Drive.<unreferenced>.InfoData.State
Variable.Comment: 0x___1 = At least one slave in 'INIT' state 0x___2 = At least one slave in 'PREOP' state 0x___3 = At least one slave in 'BOOT' state 0x___4 = At least one slave in 'SAFEOP' state 0x___8 = At least one slave in 'OP' state 0x001_ = At least one slave signals error 0x002_ = Invalid vendorId, productCode... read 0x004_ = Initialization error occurred 0x008_ = At least one slave disabled 0x010_ = At least one slave not present 0x020_ = At least one slave signals link error 0x040_ = At least one slave signals missing link 0x080_ = At least one slave signals unexpected link

Variable.Name: SyncUnits.Drive.<unreferenced>.InfoData.SlaveCount
Variable.Comment: Info data slave counter

Variable.Name: Outputs.Frm0Ctrl
Variable.Comment: 0x0001 = prevent 1. EtherCAT command from sending (request NOP) 0x0002 = prevent 2. EtherCAT command from sending (request NOP) 0x0004 = prevent 3. EtherCAT command from sending (request NOP) ... 0x4000 = prevent 15. EtherCAT command from sending (request NOP) 0x8000 = prevent complete frame from sending

Variable.Name: Outputs.Frm0WcCtrl
Variable.Comment: 0x0001 = copy data with wrong working counter of 1. EtherCAT command 0x0002 = copy data with wrong working counter of 2. EtherCAT command 0x0004 = copy data with wrong working counter of 3. EtherCAT command ... 0x4000 = copy data with wrong working counter of 15. EtherCAT command
